MutationGraph

Class TRaITNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • MutationGraph.TRaITNode

  • public class TRaITNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a node from the TRaIT tool output INVARIANT: nodes and weight are of the same length and whights.get(i) represents the weight of the edge going from this to nodes.get(i)
    Author:
    rossi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TRaITNode(java.lang.String label)
      Default constructor, creates a node labeled with a name (that should be a HUGO name of a gene)
